divs: Sighting DetailsGot home around 1045 pm , noticed a green laser like light pulsating into tree moving in circular patterns. .walked and drove around neighborhood. The beam was to high up to come from any of the single level homes here. This continues until I gave up and went to bed. But the unusual part is there was triangle shaped aircraft flying in odd patterns. Tried to take video with phone but laser beam was to thin for our phones to record very well.
Summary: green laser beam appearing about every 10 seconds coming from sky
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around September 1st 2013
